humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that there are metastases in 1 sentinel lymph node (1/1) and in 1 of 22 lymph nodes from the axillary dissection (1/22). This corresponds to N1 based on the AJCC staging system (New Rule 12).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The N stage for this patient is N1. This is based on the pathology report which indicates that there is metastatic carcinoma present in 1 out of 1 sentinel lymph node in the left axilla (SLN #1) and metastatic carcinoma present in 1 out of 22 lymph nodes in the left axillary contents (E). The report also mentions extranodal extension in SLN #2, but this is not used in determining the N stage. According to the American Joint Committee on Cancer (AJCC) staging system, N1 indicates that there is cancer in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes.
